_sText:
Objective:

T's have to get from one side of the map to the other only using smoke grenades while Ct's have scout snipers and have to try and kill them before they get to the end.

At the end of the map there are AWP snipers that can be used to shoot the CT's or a button which blows them all up xD

there are a few weapons spread out along the map but are very dangerous to get to but if you do manage to gain one it can be annoying for the CT's.

There are 6 Ct spawns and 30 T spawns so there is en equal balance on teams if you have a full enough server.

Enjoy :D

Please rate and comment on making this map better but also say what you like about it so when/if i make a new map of this kind i can make it better.
